title: IT WON'T LET ME PLAY THE GAME BECAUSE OF THE SCREEN THINGY
body: I tried playing a game of League but was suddenly given this problem with something to do with "screen". I tried to do as I was told, press Alt + Enter. It did not work. I would like to have another method to be able to play the game. I am right now trying to reinstall LoL. Just in case it does not work, please list some ideas that might help me out with my problem. Thank you for reading!

replies.body: You can change the windowmode=2 for borderless in the game.cfg file but when i tried that the game had an amazing fps drop and the camera moves really badly and its overall unplayable . Hey dude, I know you're pissed and this has been a frustrating situation.  I want this issue fixed up as much as anyone else, but you've been spending the better half of the day slamming threads where players are asking for help.  This section of the boards is managed by Player Support, not developers or coders.  I'm trying to help ease some of the pain and find workarounds until we have a more permanent solution, and you're only hurting your peers by spamming threads with nonconstructive comments.  

If you have any constructive feedback feel free to share it with the community through the [correct venues](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or your other sites, and let me help out these players here.   

If you want to help players out constructively with accurate information, that would be even better.  I only ask that if you want to shit on us you do so outside of an area where players are asking for help.  Thanks!
If your trying to help tell me why no one has answered my threads that i posted 2 days ago, not just 1 but 2.....
Umm so How do i go into the game.cfg file? I am like REALLY new at this stuff... hehe..

Browse to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config and open "Game.cfg" in notepad or any other text editor
Find this line: WindowMode=X
Change the "X" to 2. IE: WindowMode=2
Save this, then launch a custom game

This.  There's currently an issue where some players are experiencing screen issues and the current workaround has been to press Alt+Enter to toggle fulle screen.  As suggested above, you can use the config file to manually change how the game loads.  For now bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page until we have more information, and let me know if you have any questions.
